rows.label: tlk4170042101_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, Gula, Gula... Sunlight through
the trees, like a mother; a great
tree, like a father...

rows.label: tlk4170042101_msg0002
rows.name:
I am putting the natural
beauty of Gula into words.

rows.label: tlk4170042101_msg0003
rows.name:
I would like for the city's children
to also richly express the scenery
of their homeland, but...

rows.label: tlk4170042101_msg0004
rows.name:
It seems they all prefer to feel
nature with their bodies rather
than spin words, so I am ignored...
